## Pakiety

```{r}
library("mlr3verse")
```

## Wczytanie danych

```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/creditcard.csv", colClasses = c("Class" = "factor"))
data
```

```{r}
source("src/data_preparation.R")
task <- build_class_task(data,
                         scaling_method = "robust",
                         sampling = "downsampling",
                         sampling_rate = 0.001,
                         smote_nn = 4)
getTaskData(task)
```
## Wizualizacja danych {.tabset}

```{r, results='asis', echo = FALSE}
for (feature in task$feature_names) {
  cat("###", feature, "\n")
  suppressMessages(print(autoplot(task$clone()$select(c(feature)), type = "pairs")))
  plot.new()
  dev.off()
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
